replies.message: We do too! Which is your favorite sticker, Mae? - Kristen

I love BikersUnited ReliefTeams!!!! We don't sit around making "stickers" for the fun of it. We are Boots on Ground clearing debris and helping families who have lost their homes, loved ones and everything they own because TORNADOES swept through 5 States and wiped them out. How about putting our page back up?????? Yes, Facebook...please answer our questions above...thank you

To whom it may concern,

Facebook took down a page for Bikers United Disaster Relief Teams, we are a multi state team that is in the middle helping with the recent tornadoes in 5 states! Now we are without a main page to share info on!!! This is not right... this is almost disastrous to our group! Please look into this!!
